name: GDDP Integration
description: Adds a new Menu for GDDP Progression

alt-button-texture.name: Alternate Button Texture
alt-button-texture.description: Changes the menu button to something less nightmarish.

restore-bg-color.name: Vanilla Background Color
restore-bg-color.description: Changes the background color in the GDDP Menus to the Vanilla Color.

unlock-all-tiers.name: Unlock All Tiers
unlock-all-tiers.description: Disables the Locked Tiers so you can Jump Difficulties to your heart's content.

show-database-version.name: Show Database Version
show-database-version.description: Shows what version of the database you're currently on.
